stimulusHtml: A thin ring of radius R has charge +Q distributed uniformly around the ring. The center of the ring is at the origin of an x-axis perpendicular to the plane of the ring, as shown in the figure above. A point charge +q on the x-axis at position x = R is released from rest. What is its kinetic energy when it reaches position P at x = 2R on the x-axis?
